audioPlayer.triggerPlayback: Press enter or space to play audio

classification.cell: Drop response in row {{row}} of column {{column}}
classification.instructions: Put responses in the correct input to answer the question. Select a response, navigate to the desired input and insert the response. Responses can be selected and inserted using the space bar, enter key, left mouse button or touchpad. Responses can also be moved by dragging with a mouse.

bowtie.instructions: Put responses in the correct input to answer the question. Select a response, navigate to the desired input and insert the response. Responses can be selected and inserted using the space bar, enter key, left mouse button or touchpad. Responses can also be moved by dragging with a mouse.

association.instructions: Put responses in the correct response input area to answer the question. Select a response, navigate to the desired input area and insert the response. Responses can be selected and inserted using the space bar, enter key, left mouse button or touchpad. Responses can also be moved by dragging with a mouse.

clozeAssociation.instructions: Put responses in the correct response input area to answer the question. Select a response, navigate to the desired input area and insert the response. Responses can be selected and inserted using the space bar, enter key, left mouse button or touchpad. Responses can also be moved by dragging with a mouse.

drawing.highlight: To highlight the image, hold space and use your arrow keys.
drawing.keyboardPaintable: Use the arrow keys to move the cursor and hold down the space or enter key to draw.
drawing.textEditorMove: Use the arrow keys to move the text editor.

orderList.instructions: Arrange responses in the correct order to answer the question. Select a response, navigate to the desired position and insert response at that position. Responses can be selected and inserted using the space bar, enter key, left mouse button or touchpad. Responses can be moved using the up and down arrow keys or by dragging with a mouse.

mathKeyboard.title: Formula keypad
mathKeyboard.selectSymbolGroup: Select the symbol group to use
mathKeyboard.currentSymbolGroup: The current symbol groups is {{title}}. You can use this dropdown to select a new symbol group or continue to navigate the keyboard using arrow keys

graphPlotting.title: Graph Plotting Question
graphPlotting.keyboardInstructionsButton: Keyboard Instructions, press enter or space to display instructions on how to navigate the graph.
graphPlotting.toolbar: You are in a toolbar, press tab to enter it and then use the arrows to move around the tools.
graphPlotting.circle: Circle with origin on {{origin}} and passing through {{point}}
graphPlotting.parabola: Parabola with vertex on {{vertex}} and passing through {{point}}
graphPlotting.horizontalAxisInfo: The horizontal axis goes from {{min}} to {{max}} with ticks spaced every {{step}} unit(s).
graphPlotting.verticalAxisInfo: The vertical axis goes from {{min}} to {{max}} with ticks spaced every {{step}} unit(s).
graphPlotting.backgroundImageNotice: Graph has a background image with description "{{description}}".

griddedText.disclaimer: Enter either plus or minus for positive or negative value

screenReader.overallDescriptionSingular: Numberline plot from {{firstPosition}} to {{lastPosition}} with {{responseCount}} response.
screenReader.overallDescriptionPlural: Numberline plot from {{firstPosition}} to {{lastPosition}} with {{responseCount}} responses.
screenReader.numberlineInstructionElementToolActive: Press Enter or Space key to plot {{tool}} element.
screenReader.numberlineInstructionRemoveToolActive: Press Tab key to focus sequentially through responses, and then Enter or Space key to remove them.
screenReader.numberlineInstructionNoToolActive: Press Enter or Space key to move. Press Tab key to focus sequentially through responses.
screenReader.reachedMaximumResponses: You have reached the maximum responses allowed. You can delete previous responses to make adjustments.
screenReader.toolDescription: Select to plot {{tool}} on the line.
screenReader.deleteToolDescription: Press enter or space to activate, and then select a response to remove.
screenReader.elementFocusedDeleteModeNotice: Press enter or space to remove.
screenReader.plottingInstructions: Use arrow keys to move, Press Enter or Space key to plot {{tool}}, Escape key to cancel.
screenReader.afterPlotMessageDefault: {{tool}} plotted on the line, at position {{firstPosition}}.
screenReader.afterPlotMessageSegment: {{tool}} plotted on the line, from position {{firstPosition}} to position {{lastPosition}}.
screenReader.elementResponseRayOrSegment: {{validationAriaLabel}} Response, {{type}}, from {{firstPosition}} to {{lastPosition}}, whole segment is focused.
screenReader.elementResponseSegmentPoint: {{validationAriaLabel}} Response, {{type}}, from {{firstPosition}} to {{lastPosition}}, point {{focusedPosition}} is focused.
screenReader.elementActivated: grabbed, Use arrow keys to move {{focusedElement}}, Press Enter or Space key to plot, Escape key to cancel.
screenReader.pointMoved: The element in position {{oldPosition}} has been moved to position {{newPosition}}.
screenReader.segmentMoved: The segment in from {{oldLeftPosition}}, {{oldRightPosition}} has been moved to {{newLeftPosition}}, {{newRightPosition}}.

screenReader.lineValidatedCorrectAndComplete: Step {{stepNumber}} validated as correct and complete

simpleShading.title: Simple Shading Question - Press tab to enter question

sortList.instructions: To answer, arrange responses in the correct order. Select a response, navigate to the desired position and insert response at that position. Responses can be selected and inserted using the space bar, enter key, left mouse button or touchpad. Responses can also be moved by dragging or by using the up and down arrow keys.

direction.toSource: Move selected option to highest {{source}} position
direction.toTarget: Move selected option to highest {{target}} position
direction.moveUpInTarget: Move selected option up one position
direction.moveDownInTarget: Move selected option down one position

calculator.instructions: To use calculator navigate to its toolbar with tab and then use left, right, up and down arrows to navigate inside it.
calculator.moveInstructions: Select to move button with arrow keys
calculator.moveGrabbed: Calculator grabbed. Use arrow keys to move around the screen, press enter when finished.
calculator.toggleUnit: Angle unit is {{currentUnit}}, click to change to {{newUnit}}
calculator.recallValue: MR (Recall the value from the calculator's memory)
calculator.addToMemory: M+ (Add the current value to memory)
calculator.substractFromMemory: M- (Subtract the current value from the value in memory)

compass.moveCenter: Use the arrow keys to move the compass center
compass.adjustRadius: Use the arrow keys to adjust radius size
compass.rotateRadius: Use the arrow keys to rotate the radius arm
compass.draw: Hold down the space bar and use the arrow keys to draw

imagecloze.text: Add your responses in the text fields to answer the question. Navigate to the desired text input and type in your response.
imagecloze.dropdown: Select responses from the drop down fields to answer the question. Navigate to the desired drop down and select your response.

dragDrop.overlayNotificationDescription: Enter key to see list of responses, for response input area {{dropzoneNumber}} out of {{totalDropzones}}.
dragDrop.responseDescription: Select to move response to a response input area.
dragDrop.possibleResponses: {{response}} possible responses, select a response to begin moving the response to the desired drop area or drop your response here to return it to the possible responses pool.
dragDrop.emptyPossibleResponses: {{response}} possible responses, all responses have been moved out of possible responses pool.
dragDrop.instructions: Put responses in the correct response input area to answer the question. Select a response, navigate to the desired input area and insert the response. Responses can be selected and inserted using the space bar, enter key, left mouse button or touchpad. Responses can also be moved by dragging with a mouse.
dragDrop.responseZone: Select a response to begin moving the response to the desired drop area or drop your response here to return it to the possible responses pool.

ariaLiveText.missed: {{prefix}}not selected, this is the correct answer
ariaLiveText.minResponseMessage: {{prefix}} this question requires at least 1 answer
ariaLiveText.minResponsesMessage: {{prefix}} this question requires at least {{minSelection}} answers

graphPlotting.positionUpdated: x {{x}}, y {{y}}, is your current position
graphPlotting.movingPoint: You are moving the point at x={{x}}, y={{y}}
graphPlotting.pointMoved: The point {{point}} has been moved to x={{x}}, y={{y}}
graphPlotting.moved: Move successful. You now have a {{shape}}

imageclozeassociationV2.activatedResponse: Selected {{response}}. Use tab or arrow keys to drop response to a response input area. Press enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel selection.
imageclozeassociationV2.activatedResponseInDropzone: Selected {{response}}. Use tab or arrow keys to drop response to another response input area or back to possible response pool. Press enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel selection.
imageclozeassociationV2.droppedResponseInDropzone: Dropped {{response}} in response input area{{customAriaLabel}}, {{dropzoneNumber}} out of {{totalDropzones}}.
imageclozeassociationV2.droppedResponseInDropzoneWithResponse: Dropped {{response}} in response input area{{customAriaLabel}}, {{dropzoneNumber}} out of {{totalDropzones}}. {{previousResponse}} moved back to possible responses pool.

tokenHighlight.explanation: To interact with this question use tab to move through the text tokens. Use space or enter to select or deselect the relevant tokens

clozeAssociation.activatedResponse: Selected {{response}}. Use tab or arrow keys to drop response to a response input area. Press enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel selection.
clozeAssociation.activatedResponseInDropzone: Selected {{response}}. Use tab or arrow keys to drop response to another response input area or back to possible responses pool. Press enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel selection.
clozeAssociation.droppedResponseInDropzone: Dropped {{response}} in response input area{{customAriaLabel}}, {{dropzoneNumber}} out of {{totalDropzones}}.
clozeAssociation.droppedResponseInDropzoneWithResponse: Dropped {{response}} in response input area{{customAriaLabel}}, {{dropzoneNumber}} out of {{totalDropzones}}. {{previousResponse}} moved back to possible responses pool.

association.activatedResponse: Selected {{response}}. Use tab or arrow keys to drop response to a response input area. Press enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel selection.
association.activatedResponseInDropzone: Selected {{response}}. Use tab or arrow keys to drop response to another response input area or back to possible responses pool. Press enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel selection.
association.droppedResponseInDropzone: Dropped {{response}} in response input area, {{dropzoneNumber}} out of {{totalDropzones}}. Connected to {{dropzoneLabel}}
association.droppedResponseInDropzoneWithResponse: Dropped {{response}} in response input area, {{dropzoneNumber}} out of {{totalDropzones}}. Connected to {{dropzoneLabel}}. {{previousResponse}} moved back to possible responses pool.

mathKeyboard.mathKeyboardOpened: Formula keypad has been opened. Press TAB to use it and then navigate using the arrows.
mathKeyboard.mathKeyboardClosed: Formula keypad has been closed. Press Control + Backslash to open it again.
mathKeyboard.blockKeyboardOpened: Formula keypad has been opened. Press TAB to use it and then navigate using the arrows. Keypad can be found below the response input area.

bowtie.activatedResponse: The option "{{response}}" has been selected. Press tab or shift tab to choose a response area, and spacebar to insert it. Press escape to cancel.
bowtie.droppedResponse: The option "{{response}}" has been inserted in {{responseAreaLabel}}.

clozeAssociation.dropzone: Press enter key to drop response here.

association.dropzone: Press enter key to drop response here.

bowtie.dropzoneWithResponse: Insert option in position {{dropzonePosition}} of {{totalDropzones}}, which currently contains the option "{{response}}

dragDrop.dropzone: Press enter key to drop response here.

confirmrecordoverwrite: A previous audio recording exists. If you continue it will be replaced.

hints.resize: Resize hints window. Select to resize hints window

imageUpload.removeAllAnnotations: Remove all annotations when uploading the image

lineReaderDescription: Show or hide the Line Reader, a visual assistive tool for showing one line of text and masking surrounding text.
lineReaderDragHandler: Move line reader. Select to move line reader around screen
lineReaderDragHandlerGrabbed: Line reader grabbed. Use arrow keys to move around the screen. Enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel
lineReaderResizeMask: Resize line reader. Select to resize line reader window and mask.
lineReaderResizeMaskGrabbed: Resize line reader grabbed. Use left and right arrow keys to resize window horizontally and use up and down arrow keys to resize mask vertically. Enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel
lineReaderResizeWindow: Resize line reader window. Select to resize line reader window.
lineReaderResizeWindowGrabbed: Resize line reader window grabbed. Use up and down arrow keys to resize window vertically. Enter key to drop, Escape key to cancel
